subject: jbarrister296@gmail.com
body:
-- 
Today has been February 13th is the last email you will receive from
us after today this Fund will be canceled, I just want to let you
know.

I'm mr john, from the U.S. Supreme Court of Justice, I'm here to know
if I will get a reply from you so that I will know what to do.

Your Funds worth the sum of US$15,500,000.00 USD. Was brought to my
desk for cancellation so I'm texting you just because of the kind of
person I am that's why I'm texting you for the last time.

The fact is that Our government told me to cancel the funds and
confiscated it into our government account but I am having much
feelings to text you first if you are still willing to receive it then
I will work everything out for you and get the package mailed to your
home address.

So I will wait for your response from now till tomorrow morning then
if I don't get any response from you then I will sign it cancelled.

I have already completed all the necessary arrangements to ship your
funds directly to your home address to make sure you received the
pending Fund worth of US$15,500,000.00 USD with this opportunity to
avoid it being canceled and refund to the U.S. Department Treasurer
Account.

Regards to this development? Our Authorities required that you will
pay only $55.00 USD Made for Tax Clearance Stamp Duty charges, So that
we can finally complete your transaction peacefully. Get back to
confirm that you received this and please give us the proper date to
pay the required $55.00 USD possible today.

From: mr johm; jbarrister296@gmail.com

subject: Re: jbarrister296@gmail.com
body:
Hello Mr. John,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding this matter. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about these funds. Could you please provide more details about the origin of these funds? How did they end up at the Supreme Court of Justice?

Also, could you clarify what exactly the Tax Clearance Stamp Duty charges are for? Is this a standard procedure for such transactions?

I appreciate your patience and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Dean

subject: Re: jbarrister296@gmail.com
body:
Hello Mr. John,

Thank you for reaching out to me and informing me about this situation. I must say, it's quite a surprise! I'm not sure how my name got involved with such a large sum of money.

You mentioned that the funds are from the Supreme Court of Justice. Could you please explain more about why these funds were brought to your desk and why they are associated with me? 

Also, could you clarify what the Tax Clearance Stamp Duty charges are for? Is this a standard procedure?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Dean
